Articles.Content: Is there any way to make the game directly skip the Space Center scene and load up a vessel instead? Also is it possible to make said vessel appear in all savefiles is there a template for savefiles or something?

Rather old and loads strait to the VAB or SPH - thought I'd seen something that loaded the last active vessel but can't find it. Anyway - looks like it is likely possible - source code is linked but license is ARR.

22 hours ago, daniel l. said:

Is there any way to make the game directly skip the Space Center scene and load up a vessel instead? Also is it possible to make said vessel appear in all savefiles is there a template for savefiles or something?

Well, you can add the craft file to the Ships\VAB in the main directory to appear as stock craft. It only works if you play sandbox, though. Unless you make it to where stock craft files are available through your career.
